Array< double > nodes
 The array holds one parameter configuration in every column.

Detailed Description

Optimize by trying out predefined configurations.

The optPointSearch class is similair to the optGrid class by the property that it optimizes a model in a single pass just trying out a predefined number of parameter configurations. The main difference is that every parameter configuration has to be explicitly defined. It is not possible to define a set of values for every axis; refer to optGrid for this purpose. Thus, the optPointSearch class allows for more flexibility.
